name: Tale of the Leaf & Claw
description:
Legends say the people of the Leaf and of the Claw are eternal enemies, but what if the tales are wrong? Are you really a monster?

This game was made in one month for Metroidvania Month 19. The theme was "you are the monster".

NOTES

  • Keyboard and Gamepad are both supported, but most of my testing was with a gamepad, so I'd use that if you have one.
  • The area load times are a bit longer than I'd like, but they do load. It should be under a minute, and it's faster when returning to an area.
  • I ran out of time for sounds and music.
  • The game isn't finished, so play as far as you feel like. Getting the medicine to the sick man can be considered an end point.
